name: UpdateBill
description:
Update details of an existing bill.

Use this tool to make changes to an existing bill's data. It should be called when modifications to bill details are necessary.

parameters.name: bill_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill to be updated. This is required to specify which bill to modify.

parameters.name: bill_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to update a bill, including due date, entity ID, line items, memo, payment method, and other related data.

accounting_field_selections.description: List of accounting field options selected to code the bill.

inventory_line_items.description: List of inventory line items related to the bill.

invoice_number.description: The invoice number on the bill.

posting_date.description: The date the bill is posted to the accounting system.
